scripts.dev:build: bun build src/popup.ts src/background.ts --outdir dist --target browser --watch
scripts.dev: bun run dev:build & bun run dev:typecheck
scripts.build: bun build src/background.ts src/popup.ts --outdir dist --minify --target browser
scripts.build:all: bun build src/background.ts src/popup.ts --outdir dist --minify && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r static/* dist/
